input.sentences: the people in the town were very nice .
they were very warm and welcoming towards me .
they wanted to take some pictures .
i had a great time with them .
output.sentences: Going on a missions trip allowed me to see so many different ways of living like these homes.
Anytime I had my camera out, the kind people would let me take a picture of them.
Check out the kindess of these two in my picture.
Some were a little mesmerized at how cool our cameras and video cameras looked like.
Their smiles show alot of who these people truly are.
